display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=33RQ9_adLFwQ7kNvwFA-Xmx&_nc_oc=AdmDNDvTg0DdavpXQ43H0hLy--FK55QzFEwRrzjwi4XWokxDEIAUUIvt10ol4olliz0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fHjL1AqgM_p2JFWG3cA6Fw&oh=00_AfLmtRqJn5fI9oRx2ca1cxTHhjFGSaXykqbTNOAHYH7MOw&oe=68345916)


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=bjQl69TkHMcQ7kNvwG5cNKa&_nc_oc=Adnt3CirFCcEkkw0Yk6_Q-iu_wO1209YpOR6wiouPfxfMWZdtHdbagXdm6Zww2_aiqI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fHjL1AqgM_p2JFWG3cA6Fw&oh=00_AfK2gpZB0SXtt-Pg9ZqvZ4gfX-TsGocq21O0fRWrYJIDRg&oe=6834652C)

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=e4b6AW2BCZ4Q7kNvwEcs3C2&_nc_oc=AdnXV57iNKLvOvs0B3wxxmp1IM2I55jZV5MCCJOV56s4_-813z5xqLUsHS1uZRUFb1o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fHjL1AqgM_p2JFWG3cA6Fw&oh=00_AfLlNprxpbJBW8ZJiQDc82AJcqzVVLAjrQ4iDZOh7HzehA&oe=683450B2)

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=DkYNj83fGYUQ7kNvwHDTpAJ&_nc_oc=Adm_WH2O5NWN7yoGH1x-piTJ8jP5crF8gPmT_T3rLQpYWwX7P75vweScMNluHMx_m0o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fHjL1AqgM_p2JFWG3cA6Fw&oh=00_AfLhT4eF79gcpCg9Foz1JzBJXQrIhCw1Q8fOT-P3txL74A&oe=683452CC)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
